text: w'idha qalu: ma lak -ayha alrswl- ttzwj alnsa'? falaqad baeathna qablik rusulana min albashar wajaealna lahum azwajana wdhryt, wa'iidha qalu: law kan rasulana lata bima talabna min almejzat, falays fi wuse rswl 'an yati bmejzt 'aradaha qawmih 'iilaa bi'iidhn allh. likuli 'amr qdah allah kitab wa'ajal qad ktbh allah endh, la yataqadam wala ytakhr
